title: Insta-hack
effect: Temporarily gains control over a device

title: Grapple gun
effect: Pulls an object to the gun or the gun to an object

title: Glue grenade
effect: Sticks everything in the zone for 1 round Hindered

title: EMP grenade
effect: Disables all electronics in the zone for 1 round

title: Fragmentation grenade
effect: Deals damage to everything in the zone

title: Gravitational emitter
effect: Attracts/repels everything up to 1 Zone away. Moving against the emitter causes Hindrance

title: Freezing grenade
effect: Everyone in the zone is frozen. +2 Freezing

title: Multipurpose bow
effect: Shoots objects up to line of sight distance

title: Heat gun
effect: Emits immense heat up to line of sight distance

title: BFG
effect: Huge weapon: absorbs all heat from the zone for 1 round, causes Doom in the next round

title: Thermodynamic blade
effect: A blade that drains heat from enemies and heats up the wielder (+1 Effect, +1 Heat)

title: Barrier generator
effect: Creates a barrier between zones that absorbs 3 damage

title: Turret
effect: Deploy a small turret in your Zone. The turret can attack with 1 Effect during your turn. At the end of each turn, discard an Outcome card with Effect 1+ or the Turret shuts down
